content: Hello! How can I help you today?
I'm trying to understand how your memory system works.
Sure. I build graph nodes with embeddings and connect them via similarity and relevance.
Cool. Can you remember conversation context?
Yes, prior messages become nodes; retrieval uses similarity scoring.
How do you link related ideas?
I compute cosine similarity on embeddings, tag overlap, and temporal causality.
You're welcome! Let me know if you need more details.
